revised_title: Samuel Tolansky: A Pioneering Physicist and Educator
tldr: The article recounts the life and achievements of Samuel Tolansky, a pioneering physicist and educator. Born into a poor family, Tolansky overcame various obstacles to excel in his studies and eventually become a prominent figure in the field of physics. He conducted research in spectroscopy and made significant contributions to the field. Additionally, the article highlights Tolansky's passion for education and his dedication to helping others succeed, as well as his personal interests and wide-ranging intellectual curiosity.
